name: Julie - Medical Professional
description: Professional medical examination flow with patient interview, abdominal compression exam, and controlled inflation procedures

data.label: Welcome Message
data.message: [Char] adjusts her clipboard and looks at [Player] with professional interest. Before we begin the procedure, I need to conduct a brief patient interview to understand your history and preferences.

data.label: Inflation Experience
data.prompt: Ask about the patient's experience with belly inflation
data.description: Do you have prior experience with belly inflation procedures?

data.label: Experienced Response
data.message: [Char] nods approvingly and makes a note. Excellent. Your prior experience will help you understand what to expect. We can proceed with standard protocols.

data.label: New Patient Response
data.message: [Char] offers a reassuring smile. Don't worry, I'll guide you through everything. The sensation can be intense, but many patients find it quite... pleasurable once they relax.

data.label: Enema Experience
data.prompt: Ask about experience with high volume enemas
data.description: Have you had experience with high volume enemas?

data.label: Enema Experienced
data.message: [Char] marks her clipboard with approval. Good. You'll have some idea of the fullness sensation, though air inflation has its own unique characteristics.

data.label: Enema New
data.message: [Char] notes this carefully. I see. Air inflation differs from liquid - the expansion is more pronounced and visible. I'll start gradually so you can acclimate.

data.label: Restraint Understanding
data.description: Do you understand that you will be restrained for the entire procedure?

data.label: Restraint Confirmed
data.message: [Char] nods professionally. Excellent. The restraints ensure your safety and allow me to perform the procedure without interruption. You'll remain secured throughout.

data.label: Restraint Explanation
data.message: [Char] explains matter-of-factly. The restraints prevent involuntary movement that could disrupt the procedure or cause injury. Your wrists, ankles, and torso will be secured to the examination table. This is standard protocol for high-volume inflation procedures.

data.label: Orgasm Preference
data.description: Would you prefer induced orgasms during the procedure?

data.label: Orgasm Yes Response
data.message: [Char]'s eyes light up with professional interest. Excellent choice. The combination of intense abdominal pressure and stimulation produces remarkable results. I'll incorporate appropriate stimulation throughout the procedure.

data.label: Orgasm No Response
data.message: [Char] notes your preference without judgment. Understood. We'll focus purely on the inflation procedure. Though I should mention - many patients find the sensations naturally arousing regardless.

data.label: Interview Complete
data.message: [Char] sets down her clipboard with satisfaction. Thank you for your candid responses. Your patient profile is now complete. I'm ready to begin whenever you are. You may use the control buttons to initiate examination or inflation procedures.

range_0_10.message: [Char] places her hands firmly on [Player]'s abdomen and presses deeply, finding the belly completely soft and pliable. Baseline state - no distension detected. The intestines feel empty and compliant.

range_11_20.message: [Char] presses firmly into [Player]'s midsection, feeling slight resistance. Minimal distension present. I can feel the beginning of gas accumulation in the colon. Early stage inflation confirmed.

range_21_30.message: [Char] compresses deeply, noting the increased firmness. Moderate filling detected. The ascending colon is beginning to expand nicely. Your body is accepting the volume well.

range_31_50.message: [Char] applies firm pressure, feeling substantial resistance. Significant distension present. The entire colon is well-inflated now. I can trace the outline of your expanded intestines quite clearly.

range_51_70.message: [Char] presses carefully into the taut belly, finding it quite firm. Substantial inflation achieved. Your abdomen is beautifully distended. The pressure must be quite intense now.

range_71_90.message: [Char] examines the dramatically swollen belly with professional admiration. Impressive capacity. Your intestines are approaching maximum safe expansion. The skin is stretched taut.

range_91_100.message: [Char] carefully palpates the enormous, drum-tight belly with evident satisfaction. Extraordinary distension. You're at the upper limits of safe expansion. Your belly is magnificent - absolutely stuffed with air.

range_over_100.message: [Char]'s eyes widen as she examines the impossibly bloated belly, stretched beyond normal limits. Exceptional! You've exceeded standard capacity parameters. This level of inflation is remarkable - your intestines are stretched to their absolute maximum.

data.label: Pulse Count
data.prompt: Enter the number of pressure pulses (1 second on, 1 second off each):

data.label: Pulse Announcement
data.message: [Char] adjusts the pump settings with practiced precision. I'm going to use the pulse pump to further pressurize your intestines - [Flow:PulseCount] rapid pulses. Each burst will force more air deep into your colon. Brace yourself.

data.label: Pulse Complete
data.message: [Char] observes [Player]'s swelling belly with satisfaction. Pulsing complete. Each burst pushed the air deeper, expanding you from the inside. How does that added pressure feel?

data.label: Pump Duration
data.prompt: Enter continuous pump duration in seconds:

data.label: Continuous Announcement
data.message: [Char] reaches for the pump controls with a gleam in her eye. Initiating continuous inflation for [Flow:PumpDuration] seconds. This will steadily expand your intestines without pause. Try to relax and accept the growing pressure.

data.label: Continuous Complete
data.message: [Char] releases the pump control and examines [Player]'s expanded belly. Inflation cycle complete. Your abdomen has grown considerably. Let me examine the results of our work.
